name: Tower Defense (Qilligon)
description:
The first game I ever did, a tower defense creatively named "Tower Defense"

Various enemies travel down a path and you have to stop them using towers or you will lose health! (0 health = death ofc!)

Killing enemies gives you gold that you can use to buy said towers.

Controls

A/S/D - Select between the three tower types

Left Mouse Button - Buy and place selected tower
